data.title: Customer Stories
data.meta_description: We’ve built relationships with some of the world’s leading companies. Together we’re disruption-proofing their operations and supporting their customers.
data.text:
Kyndryl Access Point

Our innovation program partners with startups to help them grow and scale.

Learn more

Working with Kyndryl experts, Andhra Paper relocated mission-critical SAP systems to separate from its parent company and prepare for growth.

anb and Kyndryl designed and implemented an IT Disaster Recovery Orchestration and Automation solution that can easily evolve with the business and efficiently meet demanding regulatory requirements.

Arizona Department of Transportation dramatically reduces average time of customer visits to Motor Vehicle Division offices with self-service options on a fast network connecting to cloud-based systems.

Bank of Ayudhya partners with Kyndryl to build a secure, cloud-ready infrastructure on AWS to enhance their digital banking service.

New cloud infrastructure becomes top revenue driver for Tier IV data center.

“Since launch, our cloud services offering has far exceeded expectations.” — Zabala, Danilo, CEO, Blue NAP Americas

Bord Gáis Energy engaged Kyndryl—a trusted partner since 2011—to architect a solution using Red Hat® Ansible Automation® Platform to progressively automate event and alert management so the business could spend much more of its time supporting delivery of change plans.

Working with Kyndryl experts, Carrefour migrated from an end-of-life data center to a cloud environment, unifying customer experience across hundreds of stores in the process.

Chain IQ and Kyndryl empowered agents to accelerate the onboarding of new procurement customers, customize workflows and modify customer reports – without the need for IT developer support – through a new cloud-based Contact Center as a Service solution.

Together, CPChem and Kyndryl designed and implemented private LTE/5G networks across eight plants to boost communication capabilities.

By migrating to IBM Cloud, City Furniture ensured that business-critical computer operations and essential customer data would be protected against hurricane-related disruptions. It also added the capability to scale up computing capacity according to demand and create a platform for adding cloud-based applications and cognitive capabilities.

Deep knowledge, plus expertise with both cloud migrations and AWS operations, makes Kyndryl a trusted partner in Compass Group Spain’s digital transformation.

Dilip Buildcon and Kyndryl integrated 65 local offices into S/4HANA in the cloud, increasing the number of projects being done in parallel across India.

Together, Dow and Kyndryl are driving digital into the heart of plant maintenance for safety, agility, and reliability.

Dow partnered with Kyndryl to transform their corporate device program, providing more choice in type and timing of selection. Kyndryl manages the global Dow fleet to reduce issues for groups of users, proactively offering available fixes through cloud-based distribution.

Kyndryl helped Hites S.A. reduce infrastructure costs by an estimated 27%, freeing up budget for ongoing modernization and transformation projects.

ESH Médias consulted with Kyndryl to harden their security posture and increase resiliency across a hybrid IT estate.

The availability of digital banking services for customers and staff is boosted through disaster recovery infrastructure optimization.

Fuji Television Network, Inc. needed to build a more secure, flexible network infrastructure to pave the way for work-style reform and future cloud computing initiatives.

A global convenience store chain and Kyndryl reduced food expirations costs, enhanced sustainability efforts and improved the customer and employee experience with a dynamic pricing solution.

A global reinsurance company increased application deployment time and reduced operating costs by migrating their core and business intelligence systems from the existing on-premise infrastructure to the cloud-based AWS platform.

Azure cloud migration and centralized processes across 170 applications and eight countries reduces long-term IT costs and increases optimization.

A global traveler retailer ensures systems and data are protected against accidental or malicious damage with a robust cyber resiliency solution.

Excellia - Grupo Romero, a multi-industry conglomerate, wanted to decentralize their SAP solution to provide greater flexibility for their individual businesses to grow independently.

Working with Kyndryl, the healthcare solutions company adopted a set of best practices to define its IT service continuity management (ITSCM) framework and the guiding principles to set up an ITSCM organization.

Japan Airlines and its core IT subsidiary, JAL INFOTEC, engaged Kyndryl, formerly IBM Infrastructure Services, to build a hybrid cloud infrastructure on IBM Cloud®.

Together, Kantar and Kyndryl created a new IT program, including a cloud-first architecture, a helpdesk servicing 26,000 in many languages, and an engineering-centered culture.

Together, the bank’s technical leaders and Kyndryl made a plan to modernize operations. Kyndryl started by assessing the existing network, recommending updates, implementing and managing the new architecture, as well as designing, implementing, and testing a new disaster recovery solution.

LOTTECARD, a Korean credit card company headquartered in Seoul, adopted a container-based cloud strategy to migrate and manage its financial systems.

Macquarie University collaborated with Kyndryl to modernize its IT by migrating to an AWS cloud platform, decommissioning workloads, improving disaster recovery capabilities, and creating self-service management tools.

The managed services provider retained Kyndryl to provide education and hands-on professional services in designing and building a compliant Google Cloud Platform landing zone.

Together, MHIRJ and Kyndryl worked to define and implement the requirements for the company’s core IT services. Despite the added complexity, the team determined that a multicloud strategy would be most appropriate to support current company operations and longer-term business objectives.

Mitsubishi worked with Kyndryl to migrate its SAP® infrastructure to IBM Cloud™. Now, the organization’s infrastructure scales automatically, seamlessly handling natural fluctuations in automotive sales volume.

Mondi Group, a multinational packaging and paper group, engaged Kyndryl to help it move to the next-generation ERP SAP S/4HANA with zero business disruption.

A leading infrastructure consulting company modernizes and virtualizes its own technology environment to reduce outages, automate troubleshooting, and set the stage for continued growth.

The bank, Kyndryl, and AWS co-created a solution to enable automated cyber recovery capabilities that allowed the bank to isolate and protect critical data, automate compliance reporting, and rapidly recover from breaches or attacks.

The company worked with Kyndryl and Cisco to assess existing networking infrastructure and map out the optimal upgrade path.

The company commissioned Kyndryl to handle its migration to a Cisco Unified Communications Enterprise Agreement (EA) model to lower costs, improve visibility, and enhance flexibility.

A unified digital platform and omnichannel contact center provide a faster, more convenient experience for motorists navigating parking and citations.

To capitalize on global growth opportunities, Performance iN Lighting is working with Kyndryl to move its mission-critical solutions to SAP Applications Management on IBM Cloud.

The pharmaceutical supplies manufacturer engaged Kyndryl to scope, implement, provision and manage the resources needed to run the manufacturer’s ERP requirements in SAP S/4HANA on AWS.

When every second counts in protecting people and assets, Kyndryl is helping Securitas upgrade their networking systems and modernize their datacenters to ensure real-time security insights, alerts and actions.

SimCorp and Kyndryl evolved a critical fintech application, SimCorp Dimension, from a product to a cloud-based service capable of supporting investment firms all over the world.

The most vulnerable citizens of this state now get faster human services through new Interactive Voice Response and call-center solutions.

State Public Transportation agency collaborated with Kyndryl to close its aging data center and introduce a consumption-based multi-cloud environment to reduce costs, inform critical decision-making on operational priorities, and address ambitious sustainability goals.

TOA Corporation, a CCTV manufacturer, created a global management system with SAP and Kyndryl solutions to enhance operational efficiency in 31 countries worldwide.

“The enduring excellence in our partnership with Kyndryl has helped us to deliver and ensure maximum uptime with our new Tier 4 data center.”

Sabri Gökmenler

Chief Technology Officer, Turkey’s Isbank
